verbs.description: Trump [V: has] said there are around five locations under consideration -- here are some of the possibilities

Trump has said there [V: are] [ARG1: around five locations under consideration] -- here are some of the possibilities
Trump has said there are around five locations under consideration -- [ARG2: here] [V: are] [ARG1: some of the possibilities]
